title: Mihir Agarwal
text:
Mihir Agarwal
Hi! I am Mihir Agarwal, a Undergraduate student in Electrical Engineering, at IIT Gandhinagar.
I am interested in Probabilistic Machine Learning, Computer Vision and Network Science. My research is also aligned to these fields.
I am the Technical Coordinator at IIT Gandhinagar, leading the technical activities at my college for the student community. I have also led a team of 200 students for more than a year to organise one of the best cultural fest in Gujarat.

title: Publications And Presentations
text:
VeriBench: Benchmarking Large Language Models for Verilog Code Generation and Design Synthesis. Mihir Agarwal, Zaqi Momin, Kailash Prasad, Joycee Mekie, 2025 IEEE International Symposium on Circuits and Systems (ISCAS) [IEEE]





Disentangling the Peptide Space: A Contrastive Approach with Wasserstein Autoencoders. Mihir Agarwal, Progyan Das, In [NeurIPS 2024 Workshop on AI for New Drug Modalities] (https://neurips.cc/virtual/2024/workshop/84727)





Spatially Regularized Graph Attention Autoencoder Framework for Detecting Rainfall Extremes. Mihir Agarwal, Progyan Das, and Udit Bhatia, In Tackling Climate Change with Machine Learning workshop, NeurIPS 2023
Less But Better, Towards better AQ Monitoring by learning Inducing Points for Multi-Task Gaussian Processes. Progyan Das and Mihir Agarwal, accepted in the NeurIPS 2023 Workshop on Adaptive Experimental Design and Active Learning in the Real World RealML-2023
Focus on What’s Important! Inspecting Variational Distributions for Gaussian Processes for better AQ Station Deployment. Progyan Das and Mihir Agarwal, accepted at 2023 NeurIPS Workshop on Computational Sustainability: Pitfalls and Promises from Theory to Deployment CompSust
Conformal Prediction: A Visual Introduction. Mihir Agarwal, Lalit Routhu, Zeel B Patel, Nipun Batra, In VISxAI workshop 2023, IEEE VIS. [URL]
